ProjectTitle: Mapping the microglial heterogeneity in C9orf72-ALS and sporadic ALS using single cell profiling
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/03/2024
"Research Data Summary"
In the context of a DMP, data is more than you might think: samples, code, visualisations, processed data, ect. are also considered data.
Think of all the steps in your research project and please include the other types of data in the table.
For more information on this, check the RDM website of KU Leuven: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-standards
"Data Sharing and Reuse"
By definition, dual use refers to possible military use (https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/dmm/index).
label: good with suggestions
